body: Hey guys :) So I recently chose to retire from being a mod on avicus. I want to remember my summer as more then just video games. I hope that being retired will help cut down on my playtime so I can do better things. I just want to thank you guys so much because the last four months have been amazing! Meeting you guys has been e best thing ever and I love all of you so much <3 So I won't quit all together but I will be much less active. Thanks for reading ^-^ *My retired rank should come in any minute
body_tagged: Hey guys :) So I recently chose to retire from being a mod on avicus. I want to remember my summer as more then just video games. I hope that being retired will help cut down on my playtime so I can do better things. I just want to thank you guys so much because the last four months have been amazing! Meeting you guys has been e best thing ever and I love all of you so much <3 So I won't quit all together but I will be much less active. Thanks for reading ^-^ *My retired rank should come in any minute
title: My retirement ^-^

replies.body:
@Clock No problem! Working with the community has had it's ups and it's downs but it's been amazing working here :) 

@Snowcone Well I won't be quitting in all but just way less active on here :( Hopefully we will run into eachother though sometime! 

@Splade wow too deep :O

@Jake it's been so amazing working with you as well :D Have a great summer as well! :) 

@Eric Yeah sadly some staff members are retiring but we also have a great bunch of junior mods :) Thanks for being so nice :) Cya around!

@Jozz Haha xD You're gonna do great as a senior mod :) See ya around and enjoy your summer! 

@Merlin ;( See ya around dude!

@Rcmp Aw yeah! :P and thanks I'll miss being a staff member but I think it may be best I just retire so cya around! :D

@Howseh Thanks for being such an amazing staff manager (Well now director :o)  Have a great summer! <3

@Spicy Haha :P I'll see you on teamspeak! :)
replies.body_tagged:
@Clock No problem! Working with the community has had it's ups and it's downs but it's been amazing working here :) 

@Snowcone Well I won't be quitting in all but just way less active on here :( Hopefully we will run into eachother though sometime! 

@Splade wow too deep :O

@Jake it's been so amazing working with you as well :D Have a great summer as well! :) 

@Eric Yeah sadly some staff members are retiring but we also have a great bunch of junior mods :) Thanks for being so nice :) Cya around!

@Jozz Haha xD You're gonna do great as a senior mod :) See ya around and enjoy your summer! 

@Merlin ;( See ya around dude!

@Rcmp Aw yeah! :P and thanks I'll miss being a staff member but I think it may be best I just retire so cya around! :D

@Howseh Thanks for being such an amazing staff manager (Well now director :o)  Have a great summer! <3

@Spicy Haha :P I'll see you on teamspeak! :)

@Mango Thanks! Good luck with being a junior mod :) You'll do amazing!!

@Ingigo I'll miss you guys too :( Bye and good luck with getting Jr mod ;)

replies.body:
What...oh please and then you'd be on your phone when you're out with your friends.

Teenagers in this generation are dependent on technology. I am a Teenager and yes at the stage of my life it's REALLY needed.

You leaving the server is possible but you're not giving up on games. You'll just go play some other game and then you'll come visit us again.

BTW, I don't know you or what you've done.
